name: nextcloud-link
description: Javascript API to talk to Nextcloud

scripts.test: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d && ts-node tests/prepare-docker-nextcloud-container.ts && jest --config jest.conf.js --runInBand; docker-compose down -v
scripts.test-watch: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d && ts-node tests/prepare-docker-nextcloud-container.ts && jest --config jest.conf.js --runInBand --watch
